abstract.p: Weekly sampling of residential sales; photos; graph (M)

block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$750,000 243 East Seventh Street 4-family, 4-story circa-1900 town house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each unit; 24-by-97-ft. lot; taxes $1,300; listed at $750,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Eychner)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$750,000 243 East Seventh Street 4-family, 4-story circa-1900 town house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each unit; 24-by-97-ft. lot; taxes $1,300; listed at $750,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Eychner)

$375,000 240 East 35th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen and baths, north exposure; maintenance $1,445, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $400,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Sumitomo)

$765,000 34 North Moore Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,700-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building renovated in 1982; high ceilings, h/w floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,300, 52% tax-deductible; listed at $795,000, 26 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential/M.L.B. Kaye; Douglas Elliman)

$557,000 404 East 79th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, marble baths, whirlpool, c/a, h/w floors, 2 exposures; common charge $628; taxes $7,896; listed at $565,000, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Peter Ashe Realty)

$2.55 million 255 West 85th Street (Claremont) 2-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,078-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen, h/w floors, 2 terraces, 4 exposures, health club and nursery in building; common charge $2,078; taxes $19,800; listed at $2.7 million; 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Corcoran Group; Halstead Property Co.)

$310,000 2727 Palisade Avenue (Highpoint-on-Hudson) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, eat-in kitchen, partial Hudson River view, parking space, pool in building; maintenance $840, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $325,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Susan E. Goldy)

$19,000 5 Fordham Hill Oval 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 695-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; eat-in kitchen, living room, h/w floors; maintenance $564, includes gas and electricity, 30% tax-deductible; listed at $25,000, 5 weeks on market (Broker: Jeskill)

$315,000 98 Second Place 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 950-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 11-ft. ceilings, h/w floors, fireplace; maintenance $512, 30% tax-deductible; listed at $335,000, 16 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

$360,000 44 Prospect Park West 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, attended elevator, high ceilings, parquet floors, Prospect Park view; maintenance $690, 35% tax-deductible; listed at $325,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

$199,000 123-12 25th Road 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 75-year-old colonial; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen and bath, new h/w floors, bow windows, 17-by-92-ft. lot; taxes $1,062; listed at $199,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$315,000 166-39 21st Road 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 50-year-old Cape Cod; dining room, eat-in kitchen. h/w floors, new thermal windows, 44-by-90-ft. fenced yard; taxes $1,864; listed at $319,888, 2 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$337,000 52 Leeds Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 75-year-old colonial; enclosed front porch, dining room, fireplace, 2 walk-in closets, 2-car garage, 78-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,847; listed at $359,900, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)

$427,000 92 Joyce Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 44-year-old split-level; dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, family room, brick fireplace, hardwood floors, 75-by-101-ft. lot; taxes $8,247; listed at $439,000, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Century 21 Cerrone; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$410,000 21 Croton Lake Road 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 3,000-sq.-ft., 17-year-old town house; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, attached 1-car garage; taxes $8,253; listed at $399,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Ginnel)

$515,000 9 Colonial Road 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 50-year-old colonial; foyer, dining room, family room, wet bar, eat-in kitchen, hardwood floors, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $9,605; listed at $515,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Merritt)

$463,000 133 Siwanoy Blvd. 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 65-year-old colonial; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, patio, crown moldings, 50-by-130-ft. lot; taxes $8,262; listed at $463,000, 12 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$310,000 2609 Parkview Place 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 36-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, basement, 1-car garage, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,900; listed at $315,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)

$805,000 3 School House Lane 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 54-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, basement, 1-car attached garage, 104-by-146-ft. lot; taxes $8,700; listed at $875,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Trylon)

$1.425 million 87 McCoun's Lane 5-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 18-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, finished basement, 2-car garage, pool, fish pond, 2-acre lot; taxes $14,500; listed at $1.549 million, 10 days on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker Sammis; Daniel Gale)

$645,500 84 Connecticut Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 89-year-old colonial; dining room, kitchen with breakfast nook, finished basement, h/w floors, 4-zone heat, rear deck, 1-car oversize garage, 0.14-acre lot; taxes $3,135; listed at $625,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Brokers: Smith Hecker & Collins; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

$644,000 87 Saunders Lane 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 23-year-old contemporary; dining room, family room, living room with 31-ft. cathedral ceiling and fireplace, steam shower and whirlpool bath off master suite, 2-car garage, 2.97-acre lot; taxes $7,895; listed at $649,000. 8 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$290,000 14 L'Hermitage Circle 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,359-sq.-ft. town-house condo in an 11-year-old building; dining room, eat-in kitchen, full basement, 2-car garage; taxes $3,863; listed at $290,000, 23 weeks on market (Brokers: William Raveis; William B. May)

$1.325 million 901 Ridgefield Road 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath Colonial built in 1720 and expanded in 1998; solarium, separate guest quarters, whirlpool, 8 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 4.2-acre lot with 3 bridges, brook and waterfall; taxes $12,223; listed at $1.395 million, 10 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Wilton; Country Living)

$297,500 26 George Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 60-year-old colonial; h/w floors, fireplace, full unfinished basement, eat-in kitchen, 50-by-120-ft. lot; taxes $5,634; listed at $319,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Weichert)

$349,900 13 Oakland Road 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 80-year-old colonial; deck, fireplace, 2-car garage, full basement, 65-by-150-ft. lot; taxes $8,131; listed at $349,900, 2 days on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$247,500 369 Conklintown Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 35-year-old split-level; fireplace, deck, c/a, 2-car garage, 0.86-acre lot; taxes $5,594; listed at $249,500, 3 months on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)
